content.p: Please sign up using the form below to attend this year's face-to-face symposium. Attendance is free of charge, but all on-site participants must register in advance so that badges and entrance lists may be prepared.

p.em: Registration is open through Wednesday, April 8th, or until capacity is met. There is no on-site registration!

content.p: Symposium venue, schedule, and other details are available from the event overview.
